articles.title: Prince Philip, a Greek Royal family member to Britain’s longest serving consort - India Today
articles.description: Prince Philip, Queen Elizabeth's husband, died at the age of 99 on April 9. From a member of the Greek Royal family to Britain’s longest serving consort, his life spanned nearly a century of European history.
articles.content: Prince Philip, the irascible and tough-minded husband of Queen Elizabeth II who spent more than seven decades supporting his wife in a role that both defined and constricted his life, has died, Bucki… [+12146 chars]

articles.title: How worried should we be about links of blood clots to AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine? - CNA

articles.title: How worried should we be about links of blood clots to AstraZeneca's vaccine? - Reuters
articles.description: Europe's drug regulator on Wednesday said it had found a possible link between AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine and very rare blood clots in adults who received the shot. Britain recommended people under 30 get an alternative COVID-19 vaccine if possible.
